trans-unit.source: Defines the smallest unit of a code access security permission set for messaging.
For more information, see [Code Access Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry"></xref> class with the specified permission access levels and the path of the queue.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.PermissionAccess"></xref> property is set to this value.
The path of the queue that is referenced by the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.Path"></xref> property is set to this value.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry"></xref> class with the specified permission access levels, the name of the computer where the queue is located, the queue description, and the queue category.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.PermissionAccess"></xref> property is set to this value.
The name of the computer where the Message Queuing queue is located.
The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.MachineName"></xref> property is set to this value.
The queue description.
The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.Label"></xref> property is set to this value.
The queue category (Message Queuing type identifier).
The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.Category"></xref> property is set to this value.
Gets the queue category.
The queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.
Gets the queue description.
The label for the message queue.
Gets the name of the computer where the Message Queuing queue is located.
The name of the computer where the queue is located.
Gets the queue's path.
The queue that is referenced by the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref>.
Gets the permission access levels used in the permissions request.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
